perturbation.original_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.changed_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., also known as A.B. Watley Financial Services, with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.explanation: The introduction of "A.B. Watley Financial Services" as an alternative name for A.B. Watley, Inc. creates ambiguity. Later sections referring to "ABW" could be interpreted as referring to either entity, potentially causing confusion about which entity is bound by the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, PCQ and ABW have executed that certain Co-Branding
Agreement dated October 11, 1996, as amended on December 10, 1996 (as so
amended, the "Agreement")余
WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to further amend the Agreement to
modify the provisions of the Agreement regarding [***] of the term thereof余
and
WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to set forth herein the terms and
conditions of their agreements and understandings with respect to the
foregoing.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, PCQ and ABW have executed that certain Co-Branding
Agreement dated October 11, 1996, as amended on December 10, 1996 (as so
amended, the "Agreement")余
WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to further amend the Agreement, hereinafter referred to as the 'Co-Marketing Plan', to
modify the provisions of the Agreement regarding [***] of the term thereof余
and
WHEREAS, the parties hereto desire to set forth herein the terms and
conditions of their agreements and understandings with respect to the
foregoing.
perturbation.explanation: Referring to the 'Agreement' as the 'Co-Marketing Plan' creates confusion. It is unclear whether the 'Agreement' and the 'Co-Marketing Plan' are the same document or if a new agreement is introduced. This could lead to disputes about which document's terms apply.

perturbation.original_text:
3.
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Amendment to Co-Branding Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Master Services Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the reference from "the Agreement" to a "Master Services Agreement" introduces a new undefined document. It's now unclear which agreement takes precedence in case of conflict. This change contradicts previous recitals and introduces uncertainty about which agreements are binding.
